creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
text:
apr_palloc + memset can be safely be replaced by the equivalent apr_pcalloc 
that makes code a bit more compact.

This has already been discussed in this old thread :
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/httpd-dev/200511.mbox/%
3c20051126100823.GA31626@redhat.com%3e
